name: Employee Review System
desc: This Employee review web application is created for employees to submit feedback toward each other's performance.

name: Issue Tracker
desc: User can Create a new project Check the details of the project Create a new issue for the bug present in the project Filter the issues

name: Polling API
desc: Create an API where anyone can create questions with options and also add votes to it

name: ToDo App
desc: It is a simple TODO application using NodeJS and MongDB. where a user of this application can create,edit and delete all the ToDo items.

name: Social Media
desc: Develop a RESTful API for handling social media data, including posts, comments, and user profiles.

name: Habit Tracker
desc: React app to start tracking habits for next seven days. we can add, delete and change status of each habit for a day.

name: React ToDoApp
desc: Build a CRUD application with React and Redux. Use Redux toolkit to build this todo app with cool animations using framer-motion.

name: Buy Busy
desc: This is an online shopping / eCommerce website made using Reactjs, firebase database for storing data on cloud and ContextAPI for store state and creating functions.

name: I-Pod
desc: This is a Mini Ipod App Project which is built using React, CSS, Javascript. It is responsive across all devices.

name: IMDB Clone
desc: A mini IMDB clone app in which we can search movies based on OMDB API, with search suggestions. Clicking on a particular movie card opens a new movie page for more info. On clicking on the favourite button, we can add a movie to the favourite list which is using local storage to store movies.

name: ToDo List
desc: This is a simple Todo app built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
